ygData.subject: Maximals: Alliance or Predacon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Kluster waits for Child to reply, a message suddenly being played back by his comm-link. Maximals, a voice said, This is Shredder, ex-Destron.

Subject: Maximals: Alliance or Predacon
Message-ID: <8tuo6u+4lmu@...>
In-Reply-To: <8tuhfq+9rc0@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

::Kluster/Ramulus/Proto/Grimmler/Shredder/Firearm/Rex::

Kluster waits for Child to reply, a message suddenly being played 
back by his comm-link.

"Maximals," a voice said, "This is Shredder, ex-Destron. Requesting 
permission to enter. I am heavily damaged and need to speak with the 
leader."

"Granted," Kluster replies, "I'm Kluster, the ship's captain, I'm at 
the entrance if what you need to say is urgent."

The hatch opens behind Kluster, Shredder limping in. He was leaking 
mechfluid, and had dents and scorch marks all over his torso.

"The Destrons," he says, breathing a bit heavily as he leans against 
a wall, "They're gonna destroy the Maximals. I got away to warn you, 
but they nearly kill me."

Kluster frowns and taps a few buttons on the console he was near, 
checking the position of the Destrons. "They and the Predacons are 
helping us rebuild the Ark."

"They're allied," Shredder says, his face turning from weary to 
serious. He was making things up, but he wanted Cerebrus 
dead, "They'll get in good with your group, find out stuff about your 
ship, and then backstab you. I'd know, I used to be a Predacon, and 
then a Destron. Its normal procedure."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus stops a few miles away from the Alliance base, his scanners 
reporting gunfire. He activates his comm-link, sending a transmission 
to the CF.

"I'm at the Alliance base," he says, "Should I ask Zardus for his 
help?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Proto lands at the Cybertronian Fire, passing Shredder, Kluster, 
Child, and Galvatron and heading toward the CR chambers.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex groans, nearly falling out of a CR chamber as the door opens. He 
was repaired, but his head hurt like the pit from the gas that 
BrightBlade had gotten him with.

He stumbles out of the CR room, heading for his quarters.

"Kluster," he says into his comm-link, "I think the Predacon female 
that infultrated the ship has gotten away. She might have info on the 
ship, I'm not sure. I'm gonna take a rest, I'll be in my quarters if 
anything comes up."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler lands at the Cybertronian Fire, entering and looking at 
Kluster and the group of bots around him.

"Mangus says that the Alliance is trying to destroy time," he says to 
Kluster, "I say we get Zardus' opinion on this."

Kluster nods. Too many things were happening at once, he didn't like 
this. He recieves Ramulus' message, replying to it.

"Yeah, tell Zardus I really need to meet with him at the Cybertronian 
Fire. This is turning out to be very confusing."

He taps a few keys on the console, bringing up a list of Predacons. 
His eyes narrow as he sees the name Megatron, tapping a few keys.

"Megatron would be glad to help in Maximal destruction," he mutters 
to himself, looking through scan logs. He recieves Rex's 
transmission, not bother to decide. If the Predacons had info on the 
Cybertronian Fire, they were a definite threat. Maybe the act at the 
Ark was a trick after all..

Behind Kluster, Shredder watches the screen over Kluster's shoulder. 
The Maximal in front of him seemed to be lost in thought. Shredder 
smiles to himself. His plan was working.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
(Logo, did Firearm's attempt at getting Spears' spark temporarily 
into the machine succeed?)
